description:
Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aucun regret ! Hyogoro et Luffy, maître et disciple
Keine Reue – Das Meister-Schüler-Band von Ruffy und dem Boss
Kui Nashi: Luffy to Oyabun Shitei no Kizuna
No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
Без сожалений! Луффи и Босс, связь между учителем и учеником!
بلا ندم! لوفي والزّعيم، رابطة تلميذ ومعلّم!
悔いなし ルフィと親分師弟の絆
